================================
Fable Anniversary is an HD-remake of the role-playing game Fable. It includes DLC Lost Chapters, support SmartGlass and many improvements that have touched the visual component, interface, management and conservation system. Also added to the remake of the achievements Steam. Imagine a world where your every action will not remain without consequences and necessarily affect your future destiny. A world where every step you will vary subtly, gradually turning into a valiant warrior, fighting evil ... or in a decrepit mage with black thoughts. The whole world - only a series of tests by which everything will be able to behold your true nature. Be a hero, be a traitor, be yourself.
